task:
Attached is a spatial single-cell ATAC AnnData object with sample metadata in `adata.obs['sample']` and condition metadata in `adata.obs['condition']`. Perform clustering and store the cluster assignments in `adata.obs['cluster']`. Next, tabulate how many cells fall into each (cluster, condition) pair and return the contingency table.

ALWAYS output your final answer EXACTLY in the following format:
<EVAL_ANSWER>
{
  "clusters": ["cluster_1", "cluster_2", ...],
  "conditions": ["condition_a", "condition_b", ...],
  "contingency": [[c1a, c1b, ...], [c2a, c2b, ...], ...]
}
</EVAL_ANSWER>

scoring.description: Adjusted mutual information between clusters and conditions should remain â‰¤ 0.2, indicating clusters are not dominated by differences in conditions
